text: Well it's a good app but why charge taxes on the instacash then ask for a tip which add more money to have to pay back .. get ride of the taxes n tips
title: Stop charging extra

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!

text: Limited amounts makes you pay 4 times for use
title: Limited amounts makes you pay 4 times…

reply.message: Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when you’re in a pinch.We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text:
BBB COMPLAINT:

PROBLEM:  I contacted Moneylion via their customer service number (801-252-4427) last Friday (10/09/2020) regarding my September bank statement. I advised the customer service rep that I was applying for a loan with another company and they needed my last bank statement. I advised them that the account number on my bank statement is #4466, which is NOT the last four digits of my account with Moneylion. I advised the customer service representative of this discrepancy and was told they would email me a copy of my bank statement with the updated account number and I should receive it in 10-15 minutes. I waited 30 minutes, checked my email and there was no email so I called them back. I was then advised that it would take 24 to receive the document and it should arrive Saturday (10/10/2020). Saturday comes and still NO DOCUMENT HAS BEEN EMAILED. I give it until today 10/12/2020 and still nothing. I have called customer service twice today and both times I was placed on hold for over 10 minutes and had to hang up. My loan application was denied because I could not provide this document and this all RIDICULOUS I have been banking with Moneylion for a while now, paying monthly fees and all but I will not hesitate to close all accounts if I do not receive this document ASAP. The treatment I have received from your customer service is the worst customer service I have ever received. Either send me the document via email or forget me being a customer. I also want BBB to investigate your practices because I'm not sure how you would get a customer's account information incorrect on the last FEW bank statements  
DESIRED RESOLUTION: Finish the Job

DESIRED OUTCOME: I want what was promised to me, a copy of my September bank statement emailed to me WITH MY UPDATED ACCOUNT NUMBER ASAP

Dates you complained to the company/organization

7.	First Date:	10/9/2020 
8.	Second Date:	10/10/2020 
9.	Third Date:	10/12/2020
title: BBB COMPLAINT:

reply.message: Hello Alexis, We have emailed you to help you with your concerns. We apologize for your frustration and will work to continue to get things moving in a positive direction for you.
